snippet: For every triumphant Olympic story, a sea of athletes fall short of their dreams. Agnes Zawadzki, a figure skater, did not make the U.S. team, and even to try required huge sacrifices.
abstract: Juliet Macur Sports Of The Times column notes that for every triumphant Olympic story, a sea of athletes fall short of their dreams; describes trials of figure skater Agnes Zawadzki, who failed to make Olympic team, noting that her struggle was shared by her family.
lead_paragraph: For every triumphant Olympic story, a sea of athletes fall short of their dreams. Agnes Zawadzki, a figure skater, did not make the U.S. team, and even to try required huge sacrifices.

headline.main: Struggle to Reach Olympics Is the Family’s, Too
headline.print_headline: The Struggle Is the Family’s, Too
